name: Twinsane
description:
In the 2.5D puzzle-platformer, Twinsane, twin sisters, Madison and Emma, find themselves in the middle of a chaos, as they wake up in an abandoned underwater facility, torn up by an unknown danger. While avoiding the invisible threat, they must find their way back to the surface before it consumes them as well.

CONTROLS
WASD to Move
Space to Jump
Q to Switch Character
SHIFT to Move Crate
Esc to Pause

CREDITS
Game made by 
Miia Nykänen - art, design and management
Emmi Rukkila - development, design and management

Additional Thanks
Emilia Pitkänen - assist in art & emotional support

Audio

"Science fiction door code accept 1" obtained from Zapsplat
"Science fiction door slide open 1" obtained from  Zapsplat
"Water Splash (Yo Frankie!)" by Blender Foundation, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
"water swimming 1" obtained from Pixabay

KNOWN ISSUES

  • Animation transitions still need to be worked on, currently you might notice some quirks while switching from one movement to another.
  • Character switch sometimes refuses to work, this can be fixed by restarting the level from pause menu.
  • Sometimes Madison may slow down drastically, this can be fixed by restarting the level from pause menu.
